axes.name: Wood Cutter's Axe
axes.lore: A sturdy, reliable axe used by logging elves to harvest festive timber.

axes.name: Wall Guard Axe
axes.lore: A dependable axe given to guards who survive the academy but fall short of Guardian rank.

axes.name: Pick Axe
axes.lore: Used primarily for excavation, its sharp point is surprisingly useful in combat.

axes.name: Spade Axe
axes.lore: A simple garden spade with a sharpened edge. Useful for both digging and battle.

axes.name: Meat Cleaver
axes.lore: A massive, heavy cleaver with an extended, sturdy handle, wielded by Foodkin butchers.

axes.name: Pizza Cutter
axes.lore: A large, wickedly sharp rotary blade on a wooden haft. Deals continuous cutting damage.

axes.name: Bone Axe
axes.lore: Crude but effective axe made from bone and sinew. Common Ice Elf weaponry.

axes.name: Jaw Bone
axes.lore: A terrifying axe fashioned from the preserved jawbone of a giant frozen creature.

axes.name: Megalodon Tooth
axes.lore: A prehistoric megalodon tooth shaped and mounted as a massive, jagged axe head.

axes.name: Dice of Fortune
axes.lore: A weapon built around a Dungeons & Dragons style die, granting random elemental effects.

axes.name: Gear Axe
axes.lore: A large, half-cut gear cog affixed to a stick. Its spinning teeth remain dangerously sharp.

axes.name: Stained Glass Axe
axes.lore: A beautiful but fragile axe, its light refractions can momentarily blind opponents.

axes.name: Tambourine Axe
axes.lore: The sharpened jingles and frame of a tambourine repurposed for chopping.
